content.rendered:
The protagonist of the series is dr. Shaun Murphy, a young and exceptionally talented surgeon who completely shakes up the life of one of the most prestigious hospitals in the United States. His colleagues have a hard time knowing what to do with Murphy, who is struggling with autism and Savant syndrome. He is unable to form a personal relationship with his co-workers while constantly questioning the experience of his colleagues with his extraordinary solutions. Not only does Murphy save those who have been relinquished, it also proves invaluable in the professional development of other hospital staff.”

Number of Seasons: 6 (2017-)

Status: Ongoing

Creator: David Shore

Channel: ABC

Starring: Freddie Highmore, Hill Harper, Richard Schiff
